meanings.definition: A brief or trivial item of news or information.
meanings.sent1: The teacher shared some interesting factoids during class.
meanings.sent2: I read some factoids about animals in the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The factoids about the weather made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of factoids waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The factoids about space were so fascinating that I couldn't stop reading.

meanings.definition: Something that is true or real; a fact.
meanings.sent1: He presented several factoids to support his argument.
meanings.sent2: The factoids in the report were crucial for making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The factoids about history were so intriguing.
meanings.sent4: In a world of opinions, she valued factoids above all.
meanings.sent5: The factoids about nutrition were eye-opening and informative.
